title: Category Extended Parallel Coordinates Plot
collaborators: Shivam Agarwal, Madhav Poddar, Fabian Beck
description: Category Extended Parallel Coordinates Plot (CXPCP) is a visualization technique that allows users to explore and analyze high-dimensional data with categorical variables in a single plot. It extends the traditional parallel coordinates plot by adding a category axis, enabling users to visualize and compare data across different (overlapping)categories.

title: Ocean Explorer: A User-Friendly Tool for Meteorologists
description: Developed a desktop application for the Indian Meteorological Department (IMD) to visualize and analyze meteorological data from devices deployed in the Indian Ocean region. The application provides a user-friendly interface for exploring multivariate time series data with rich interactions.
